name: laudspeaker
tagline: An open source platform for customer messaging and campaigns
description: Laudspeaker is an open source customer messaging platform for sending product emails, in app messages and campaigns. It supports segmentation, templates and event based triggers, and can be self hosted for full control over customer data.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Email campaigns, In-app messages, Push notifications. Reach customers on every channel

features.title: Event
features.description: Trigger-based messaging, User behavior tracking, Automated workflows. Send messages at the right time

features.title: Segmentation
features.description: Customer segments, Targeted campaigns, Personalization. Deliver relevant messages to each user

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Full data control, Privacy-focused, Custom deployment. Own your customer communication platform
